title: Glowing Clock Watch Face
summary: For a watch face retro and fun
description: Glowing Clock, Watch Face for Android Wear! Glowing Clock, with retro and fun design does what a watch does best: show time! ## NOTE: /!\ Your watch must be running with min Android Wear 5.0. /!\** Installation The watch face will be automatically installed on your watch via your paired phone. However, if this was not the case, launch the Wear Android application and go into Settings, then press "resynchronize applications." Once installed, you can press 1 second on the time of your watch, and select Prestige For Her** Settings Choice of different types of hands (simple or complex)Choice between different base (simple or complex)100% freedom on the colors of all elements (alpha, color) Play with the power of the glow on the items you want to accentuateShow the battery
descriptionHTML:
Glowing Clock, Watch Face for Android Wear!
Glowing Clock, with retro and fun design does what a watch does best: show time!

## NOTE:
/!\ Your watch must be running with min Android Wear 5.0. /!\

** Installation
The watch face will be automatically installed on your watch via your paired phone.
However, if this was not the case, launch the Wear Android application and go into Settings, then press "resynchronize applications."
Once installed, you can press 1 second on the time of your watch, and select Prestige For Her

** Settings
Choice of different types of hands (simple or complex)
Choice between different base (simple or complex)
100% freedom on the colors of all elements (alpha, color)
Play with the power of the glow on the items you want to accentuate
Show the battery
